txt.en: Ingredients for weaponsmithy are obtained from prospectors who have worked the raw ore materials into ingots. You can trade with players who have prospecting, directly, or you can visit the auction hall to find the materials that you need. Weaponsmiths will also need to trade with woodworkers for some rarer ingredient pieces as you progress deeper into your proficiency as a Weaponsmith.\n\n<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: Ingredient packs can also be found on the LOTRO Store.
How can I get ingredients for weaponsmithy?
